ISSUE.TITLE: Add job cancel button to Workflow Job Output Screen
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: On the job output screen of a Workflow, I am suggesting that a cancel button be added there. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/63685497/123325647-45a6a000-d506-11eb-9ee4-8efc4f0063a9.png)
